tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE boxing_champions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  weight_class VARCHAR(50),
  nationality VARCHAR(100),
  wins INT,
  losses INT,
  draws INT,
  championships_won VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE boxing_champions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    weight_class VARCHAR(20),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    title_won_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE boxing_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    champion_id INT,
    opponent_name VARCHAR(50),
    result VARCHAR(10),
    round INT,
    knockout BOOLEAN,
    date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (champion_id) REFERENCES boxing_champions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE boxing_champions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    weight_class VARCHAR(50),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    record VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE titles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    champion_id INT,
    title_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_awarded DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_champion_id FOREIGN KEY (champion_id) REFERENCES boxing_champions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    champion_id INT,
    opponent VARCHAR(50),
    result VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_champion_id FOREIGN KEY (champion_id) REFERENCES boxing_champions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE boxing_champions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  weight_class VARCHAR(20),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE boxing_titles (
  title_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  champion_id INT,
  title_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_won DATE,
  UNIQUE(champion_id, date_won)
);

CREATE TABLE boxing_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  champion_id INT,
  opponent_name VARCHAR(50),
  result VARCHAR(10),
  date DATE,
  venue VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE boxing_stats (
  stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  champion_id INT,
  wins INT,
  losses INT,
  draws INT,
  KO INT
);

CREATE TABLE past_boxing_champions (
    champion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    champion_name VARCHAR(255),
    weight_class VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE boxing_titles (
    title_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title_name VARCHAR(255),
    weight_class VARCHAR(50),
    champion_id INT,
    date_received DATE
)

CREATE TABLE boxing_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    champion_id INT,
    opponent_name VARCHAR(255),
    result VARCHAR(10),
    fight_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE hall_of_fame (
    hall_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    champion_id INT,
    year_inducted INT,
    induction_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE bouts (
    bout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    belt_title VARCHAR(100),
    weight_class VARCHAR(50),
    champion1_id INT,
    champion2_id INT,
    date_held DATE
)
